'''Celebration Balloons''' are objects found in the archery challenge [[Bullseye Balloons]] in the Windblume Festival.

When they are popped, the player will gain points, and the balloon will explode, destroying the balloons around it.

The design is similar to Klee's bombs ([[Jumpy Dumpty]]) and resembles her toy doll [[Dodoco]].

==Events==
*[[Invitation of Windblume]], Bullseye Balloons
